titleStmt.title: Illustrated Verses on the Labors of Hercules P. Oxy. 22 2331

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - Changes requested by Lougovaya have been made. Ready.
Finalized - Changes requested by Lougovaya have been made. Ready.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: i. 10: change the first word to [ηὔ]χ̣[ησε; l. 12: δεινὸς I would do acute before the comma;18: μάψας change to μάρψας; 21: τέθ[ηκα.’ Russo prints τέθ[εικα.’ I am not sure that χαμ̣[α]ι̣λεοντα=PN in l. 20 in place of Russos' |χαμ̣[α]ι̣λεοντα{ν̣} constitutes a 'new reading' (as stated in the intro); I think it rather falls under normal corrections. Meta: I'd suggest to add in the General Notes that there are three illustrations/drawings.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - Text: i. 10: change the first word to [ηὔ]χ̣[ησε; l. 12: δεινὸς I would do acute before the comma;18: μάψας change to μάρψας; 21: τέθ[ηκα.’ Russo prints τέθ[εικα.’ I am not sure that χαμ̣[α]ι̣λεοντα=PN in l. 20 in place of Russos' |χαμ̣[α]ι̣λεοντα{ν̣} constitutes a 'new reading' (as stated in the intro); I think it rather falls under normal corrections. Meta: I'd suggest to add in the General Notes that there are three illustrations/drawings.

Vote - Return-Straight-to-Sender - Metadata: Delete volume number of P. Oxy. 22 2331. Biblio: Add Heitsch, Biblio 6560, p. 48-49, no. S 9; Russo, Biblio 86377, p. 340-341. As the text that has been entered into the database seems to follow Russo (or does it?), make this the principal edition, and make P.Oxy. 22 2331 a ‘previous edition’. If princ. ed. is not Russo, then please make clear who it is.
Add link to online photos: http://163.1.169.40/cgi-bin/library?e=d-000-00---0POxy--00-0-0--0prompt-10---4------0-1l--1-en-50---20-about---00031-001-1-0utfZz-8-00&a=d&c=POxy&cl=CL5.1.8&d=HASHa6305cc2f80678a195d4b6
Keywords: add “drawing” Delete legacy display name.
Text, col. ii, l. 9: Remove “reg” tags and just print words with iota subscript. Line 12, delete *middot*, as it is not on the papyrus. Line 14, add underdot to eta in μ̣η̣δὲν; delete *middot*, as it is not on the papyrus. Line 16, ὃ πεποίηκας seems to follow P.Oxy. Should be encoded <:ὃ πεποίηκας=P.Oxy. 22 2331|ed|{o}πεποίηκας=Russo:> Line 17 →: <:ἐπεποιήκη=Page|ed|ἐπεποιηκα=pap.:>. Line 18: which edition brackets gamma in ἐ[γ]ὸ . Please make clear in rest of text which is

As the text that has been entered into the database seems to follow Russo (or does it?), make this the principal edition, and make P.Oxy. 22 2331 a ‘previous edition’. Should be encoded <:ὃ πεποίηκας=P.Oxy. 22 2331|ed|{o}πεποίηκας=Russo:> Line 17 →: <:ἐπεποιήκη=Page|ed|ἐπεποιηκα=pap.:>. Line 18: which edition brackets gamma in ἐ[γ]ὸ . Submit - This papyrus transcriptions was edited as part of the Digital Papyrology Webinar SS2020 led by Dr. Ast. This is the first submission of the transcription.
Submit - This papyrus transcriptions was edited as part of the Digital Papyrology Webinar SS2020 led by Dr. Ast. This is the first submission of the transcription.

div.p: Called the earliest Greco-Roman graphic novel, this illustrated papyrus features a dialogue between two interlocutors, one of whom is the famous Hercules. The other interlocutor challenges the great Hercules to describe his labors while promising to reveal what Heracles actually did through a series of grulloi , "images". Because previous editions show substantial variations, ranging from omitted words or lines to unnecessary substitutions, a new edition was called for. The present edition compiles the previous editions, noting variations from those publications.

ηὔχησε σθεναρῷ πάντοτε γρύλλῳχθεναρ πάντοτε γρύλλῳnon transcribedθεναρ πάντοτε γρύλλῳ
περὶ ἄθλων ἐρίσαι τὸ περικάθαρμαεἄθλων ἐρίσας ὃ περι κάθαρμαnon transcribedπερὶ ἄθλων ἐρίσας ὃ περικάθαρμα.
ἀλλ’ αὐτὸς ἔρχεται καταδιαβαίνωνκαταδιαβένωνκατα διαβαίνων
καρνᾶριςκάρναλις, ἄστομος, δεινός, ἄγροικος
θρασὺ δὴ πρὸς ἔμ’ ἄγοςἄγο εἶσιν ὁ τρισέληνοςnon transcribedδπροσεμαγοειν ὁ τρισέληνοςδπροσεμαγοειν ὁ τρισέληνος.
οἷ νῦν μηδὲν ὅλως τρέσας λαλήσω
‘λέγε, παῖλέγεται Ζηνὸς Ὀλυμπίου, φράσον μοι,
ποῖοντίνα πρῶτον ὃ πεποίηκαςὃτι πεποίηκαςἐποίησαςο πεποίηκας ἆθλον εἶπονεἶπον,,
καί μουκἀμοῦ μάνθαν’ ὃμάνθανεὃμάνθανε πρῶτον ὃ πρῶτον ἐπεποιήκηἐπεποίηκαἐγ’ἐποίησαςὃ πεποίηκα.’

‘ἐγὸ πρῶτον ΝεμέῃΝεμᾳη λέοντα μάρψας
κρατεραῖς χείρεσίχέρεσί μου ταύταις ἀπέκταν.’ἀπέγξα
‘ἐγὸεἰς δύσληπτονδύσληπονδίς λήπον ἑλὼνἑλὼἐγὼἔχω χαμαιλεοντανχαρα λέοντανχαροπα λέοντανχαμαιλεοντα
προσπνίξας ἀλόγωςἀμόγως νευρὸν τέθεικα.'τέθηκα.'

item.p: Neither Page nor Maas print these lines. Russo follows the "Oxyrhynchus Papyri" edition.
